tool_description:
Airspace's API allows publishers and experience designers to create Aircards using our HTML-based guidelines. A valid API key is required to publish custom Aircards to other Airspace hosts.

**We strongly advise using AirkitUtils.js for making calls from your custom Aircard HTML file**
name: Airspace Platform
title: Airspace Platform

api_list.name: /CurrentVisitorsAtAirspot
api_list.description: Get a list of current visitors at a specific Airspot.

required_parameters.name: livemode
required_parameters.description: Set livemode to true to fetch actual visitor list - you must do this before publishing your cards to the Airspace community.

required_parameters.name: airspotid
required_parameters.description: You must provide the current Airspot ID - utilize the AirkitUtils.js to automatically detect and generate the API GET URL for your needs.
